input.sentences: i wanted to make sure i knew the route before our adventure .
the scenery outside was a little gloomy but very green .
we certainly ran into a lot of corn .
we had a great view from the highway where we were
we stopped at a cool looking farmhouse too .
output.sentences: The woman studied the map for her trip.
She rode out into the country.
On the way she passed a corn field.
She had a view of the highway.
She then got to a charming old farmhouse.
